paragraph: Now, in the city, Maya, a internal-affairs detective, must expose the officers who staged a shooting before a deadline. When the police union and command staff stonewalling her case forces Maya to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Maya realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Maya faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

When the police union and command staff stonewalling her case forces Maya to commit, there is no turning back.
After a brutal setback, Maya realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Maya faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
